goal.ch: 本課程主要在介紹當今重要的幾個電化學研究項目，其中包含電化學界面的結構及檢測方式，就實用面而言，電鍍在半導體中銅製程的應用，燃料電池中的電催化反應，染料分子在二氧化鈦的吸附，光電化學的基本原理等為重點項目。希望藉由此一課程，學生對當今電化學研發的重點能有清楚的認知。
goal.en: “this course covers the modern aspect in electrochemsitry, including fundamental study of electrified interface, and practical applications such as Cu electroplating in the fabication of silicon chip, electrocatalysis at the fuel cells, dye molecule adsorbed on TiO2, and the concept of photoelectrochemistry. the objective is to establish some fundamental background and techniques needed for students to substantiate their study.“

outline.ch:
“1. electrified interfaces
2. electric double layers
3. Surface probing techniques
4. Surface Structures
5. Adsorption of anions at metal electrodes
6. Electrodeposition of metal adlayers
7. Electrocatalysis
8. Electrochemical methods for interfacial electrochemistry“
outline.en:

textbook.ch:
“1. ““Electrochemical methods - fundamentals and applications““ by A. J. Bard, L. B. Faulkner
2. “Principles of Adsorption and Reaction on Solid Surfaces” by R. I. Masei
3. “Introduction to surface chemistry and catalysis” by G. A. Somorjai.“
textbook.en:
“1. ““Electrochemical methods - fundamentals and applications““ by A. J. Bard, L. B. Faulkner

ch.competencies: 具備研究領域之專業知識
可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
自我鞭策不斷學習新知識

en.competencies: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.
